document.masterDocTitle: The genus Hylaeus Fabricius in Mongolia, an updated species inventory (Hymenoptera: Apoidea, Colletidae)

Distribution in Mongolia .
Uvs Aimag, *Khovd Aimag, *Govi-Altai Aimag, *Bayan-Khongor Aimag, Selenge Aimag, *Tuv Aimag, *Khentii Aimag, *Dornogovi Aimag, *Sukhbaatar Aimag, *Dornod Aimag (
Fig. 3
f).

General distribution. Transpalaearctic species, from northern Africa ( Morocco , Algeria , Tunisia ) up to Mongolia , China (Hebei), and Russian Far East; Turkey , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Lebanon , Syria ; absent in Europe only in the British Isles and Scandinavia.
